newsletterSubscribeForm.labelGroups: Choose which of our newsletters to receive
newsletterSubscribeForm.subscribeSuccess: Hope you enjoy reading our newsletters!

subscribeNewsletterPage.leadText:
Subscribe to Kultus newsletters here! We will send you information about our current topics via email approximately once a month.

By subscribing to the Kultus newsletter, I agree that the information I send will be stored in the subscriber register. You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time.
